name: DadDeck™ - Depth & Quality Enhancement User Stories
description: Fleshing out existing features with 105-card database, improving battle depth, collection experience, pack opening polish, and technical quality.

userStories.title: Card Database Validation - 105 Cards
userStories.description: As a developer, I want all 105 cards validated, so the database is error-free.
acceptanceCriteria: All cards have valid type from 16 dad types
All cards have valid rarity (common through mythic)
All required fields present (name, subtitle, type, rarity, stats, flavorText, series, cardNumber, totalInSeries)
Season ID is 1 for all cards

userStories.title: Card Type Distribution Verification
userStories.description: As a developer, I want all 16 dad types represented, so players have variety.
acceptanceCriteria: Balanced distribution (6-7 cards per type average for 105 cards)
Report generated showing counts for each type
Test logs type distribution to console

userStories.title: Card Rarity Distribution Update
userStories.description: As a developer, I want rarity distribution updated for 105 cards, so pack odds remain balanced.
acceptanceCriteria: Pack generation still follows slot rules

userStories.title: Battle System - Stat Normalization
userStories.description: As a player, I want battles to consider card count advantage, so larger decks don't auto-win.
acceptanceCriteria: Normalize stats: divide by card count (3-card deck: stats/3, 5-card: stats/5)
Add unit tests for normalized vs non-normalized

userStories.title: Battle System - Type Advantage Matrix
userStories.description: As a player, I want type advantages (like Pokémon), so deck building has strategy.
acceptanceCriteria: Example: BBQ_DAD +20% vs GOLF_DAD (heat melts golf game)
Example: FIX_IT_DAD +20% vs TECH_DAD (analog beats digital)
Example: GOLF_DAD +20% vs COACH_DAD (golf vs sports coach rivalry)
Battle UI shows type advantage indicator

userStories.title: Battle System - Synergy Bonuses
userStories.description: As a player, I want synergy bonuses for themed decks, so specialization is rewarded.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect deck themes: 'All BBQ_DAD', 'All COUCH_DAD', etc.
5+ cards of same type = 15% synergy bonus
3+ cards of same type = 5% synergy bonus

userStories.title: Battle System - RNG Variance
userStories.description: As a player, I want some RNG in battles, so outcomes aren't 100% predictable.
acceptanceCriteria: Add ±10% random variance to final damage
Seeded RNG for replayability (same seed = same result)
Unit tests for RNG variance ranges
Battle log shows 'CRITICAL HIT!' or 'Glancing blow...'

userStories.title: Battle System - Status Effects
userStories.description: As a player, I want status effects in battles, so combat has more depth.
acceptanceCriteria: 4 status effects: GRILLED (defense -20%), LECTURED (attack -20%), DRUNK (accuracy -30%), WIRED (speed +30%)
BBQ_DAD cards apply GRILLED on hit
Battle UI shows status icons on cards
Unit tests for status effect calculations

userStories.title: Battle UI - Animation Polish
userStories.description: As a player, I want battle animations, so combat feels exciting.
acceptanceCriteria: Hit animation: screen shake + damage number popup
Critical hit: larger screen shake + 'CRITICAL!' text
Status effect applied: particle effect + icon

userStories.title: Battle UI - Battle Log
userStories.description: As a player, I want a battle log, so I can understand what happened.
acceptanceCriteria: Entries: 'Grill Master Gary attacks for 125 damage! (CRITICAL!)'
Colored text: green for good, red for bad, yellow for crit
Export battle log as text file
Copy battle log to clipboard button

userStories.title: Deck Builder - Type Suggestions
userStories.description: As a deck builder, I want type synergy suggestions, so I can build better decks.
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze current deck: detect dominant type
Suggest cards: 'Add 2 more BBQ_DAD for 15% synergy bonus'
Show missing type cards in collection
Highlight synergistic cards when dragging to deck

userStories.title: Deck Builder - Stat Optimization
userStories.description: As a deck builder, I want stat optimization tips, so I can maximize win rate.
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze deck stats: find weakest stat
Suggest: 'Your deck has low Fix-It (45). Add Fix-It Dads.'
Highlight stat imbalances (e.g., 100 Grill Skill, 20 Fix-It)

userStories.title: Deck Builder - Import/Export
userStories.description: As a player, I want to share deck lists, so I can try community builds.
acceptanceCriteria: Export deck as JSON or text format
Validation: checks if user owns all cards
Share deck URL (encoded in query param)

userStories.title: Collection - Card Rarity Badges
userStories.description: As a collector, I want rarity badges in gallery, so I can quickly scan for valuable cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Rarity badge overlay on card thumbnail

userStories.title: Collection - Card Count Badges
userStories.description: As a collector, I want duplicate count badges, so I know how many copies I own.

userStories.title: Collection - Missing Cards Tracker
userStories.description: As a collector, I want to see which cards I'm missing, so I know what to hunt for.
acceptanceCriteria: Missing cards panel: shows all unowned cards
Click missing card to see details (from database)

userStories.title: Collection - Wishlist
userStories.description: As a collector, I want to wishlist cards, so I can track goals.
acceptanceCriteria: Star button on card detail: add to wishlist
Shows: card name, rarity, why you want it
Notification when you pull wishlisted card

userStories.title: Collection - Advanced Search
userStories.description: As a collector, I want advanced search filters, so I can find specific cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter: has abilities vs no abilities

userStories.title: Collection - Card Detail Modal
userStories.description: As a collector, I want detailed card info in modal, so I can learn about cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Click card in gallery → opens modal
Shows: full-size artwork, all stats, abilities, flavor text
Rarity badge, type badge, card number
Add to deck button (if enough copies)
Close button + ESC key + backdrop click

userStories.title: Collection - Collection Value
userStories.description: As a collector, I want to see my collection's value, so I feel progress.
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate collection value: based on rarity + holo + upgrades
Common = 1 point, Uncommon = 5, Rare = 25, Epic = 100, Legendary = 500, Mythic = 5000

userStories.title: Pack Opening - 105-Card Pool Integration
userStories.description: As a player, I want packs from 105-card pool, so variety is doubled.
acceptanceCriteria: Update generator.ts to use all 105 cards
No duplicate cards in single pack (when possible)
Unit test: generate 1000 packs, verify variety
Test: each card appears at least once in 1000 packs

userStories.title: Pack Opening - New Card Reveal Effects
userStories.description: As a player, I want unique reveal effects for new card types, so discoveries feel special.
acceptanceCriteria: Only trigger once per unique card

userStories.title: Pack Opening - Rarity-Specific Animations
userStories.description: As a player, I want rarity-based reveal animations, so rare cards feel epic.
acceptanceCriteria: Epic: flip + purple particles + screen shake (0.8s)
Legendary: flip + orange particles + screen shake + delay (1.0s)
Mythic: flip + rainbow particles + screen shake + delay + fanfare (1.5s)

userStories.title: Pack Opening - Pack Tear Variations
userStories.description: As a player, I want different pack tear animations, so opening stays fresh.
acceptanceCriteria: All lead to same card reveal

userStories.title: Pack Opening - Skip/Fast-Forward
userStories.description: As a player, I want to skip animations, so I can open packs quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: SKIP button: reveal all cards instantly

userStories.title: Pack Opening - Pull Quality Meter
userStories.description: As a player, I want a pull quality rating, so I know how good my pack was.
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate pack score: rarity points + holo bonus
Mythic = 1000, Legendary = 500, Epic = 100, Rare = 25, Uncommon = 5, Common = 1

userStories.title: Pack Opening - Streak Counter
userStories.description: As a player, I want to see my pack opening streak, so I track lucky runs.
acceptanceCriteria: Track consecutive pack opens with rare+ cards

userStories.title: Card Artwork - SVG Generation for 105 Cards
userStories.description: As a developer, I want SVG artwork for all 105 cards, so UI is complete.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate SVG placeholders for all 105 cards
Colors match dad type (BBQ_DAD = red/orange, etc.)
Unique pattern per card ID (seeded random)

userStories.title: Card Artwork - Type-Based Color Themes
userStories.description: As a player, I want distinct color themes per dad type, so I can identify cards at a glance.

userStories.title: Card Artwork - Rarity Visual Indicators
userStories.description: As a player, I want rarity to be visually obvious, so I can spot valuable cards instantly.
acceptanceCriteria: Legendary: orange border + intense glow + particles

userStories.title: Card Artwork - Holo Overlay Effects
userStories.description: As a player, I want holo cards to look premium, so they feel special.
acceptanceCriteria: Reverse holo: background rainbow, card flat
Full art holo: entire card rainbow gradient

userStories.title: Card Artwork - Card Back Design
userStories.description: As a player, I want a cool card back, so cards feel authentic.

userStories.title: Card Artwork - Card Flip Animation
userStories.description: As a player, I want smooth card flip, so inspecting cards feels tactile.
acceptanceCriteria: Front shows card artwork, back shows card back

userStories.title: Card Stats Visualization - Radar Chart
userStories.description: As a player, I want radar chart for stats, so I can compare cards visually.
acceptanceCriteria: Axes: 8 stats (Dad Joke, Grill Skill, Fix-It, etc.)
Color-coded: green for high, red for low
Interactive: hover axis to see stat name

userStories.title: Card Stats Visualization - Stat Bars
userStories.description: As a player, I want stat bars with colors, so strengths are obvious.
acceptanceCriteria: Bar length proportional to stat value (0-100%)

userStories.title: Card Abilities - Tooltip System
userStories.description: As a player, I want ability tooltips, so I understand complex effects.
acceptanceCriteria: Tooltip shows: ability name, description, examples
Mobile: tap and hold to show tooltip
Rich text: bold keywords, color-coded effects

userStories.title: Card Abilities - Keyword System
userStories.description: As a developer, I want ability keywords, so abilities are standardized.
acceptanceCriteria: Define keywords: BURN, LECTURE, FIX, NAP, etc.
Abilities reference keywords: 'Apply BURN (20 damage per turn)'
Update card database with keyword tags

userStories.title: Technical - Performance Optimization
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the app optimized, so it runs smoothly on mobile.

userStories.title: Technical - Bundle Size Optimization
userStories.description: As a developer, I want bundle size <500KB gzipped, so load times are fast.

userStories.title: Technical - Animation Performance
userStories.description: As a developer, I want 60fps animations, so the app feels smooth.
acceptanceCriteria: Will-change CSS property for animated elements

userStories.title: Technical - Memory Leak Audit
userStories.description: As a developer, I want memory leaks fixed, so the app doesn't crash.
acceptanceCriteria: Audit all Svelte components for subscriptions
Check for event listeners not removed
Test: open 100 packs, check memory usage

userStories.title: Technical - LocalStorage Quota Management
userStories.description: As a developer, I want LocalStorage quota managed, so saves don't fail.
acceptanceCriteria: Compress old pack data (remove timestamps, etc.)
Graceful degradation: show error if full
Update collection store with quota management

userStories.title: Technical - Error Boundary Coverage
userStories.description: As a developer, I want error boundaries on all components, so crashes don't break the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Wrap all major components in ErrorBoundary
Test: trigger errors, verify boundaries catch

userStories.title: Testing - Unit Tests for 105 Cards
userStories.description: As a developer, I want unit tests for all 105 cards, so data errors are caught.

userStories.title: Testing - Pack Generation Tests (105 Cards)
userStories.description: As a developer, I want pack generation tested with 105 cards, so variety is verified.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: generate 1000 packs, verify all 105 cards appear
Test: verify rarity distribution for 105-card pool
Test: verify no duplicates in single pack (when possible)

userStories.title: Testing - Battle System Tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want battle system tested, so mechanics are verified.

userStories.title: Testing - Collection Store Tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want collection store tested, so state management is verified.

userStories.title: Testing - Crafting System Tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want crafting system tested, so recipes are verified.

userStories.title: Testing - UI Component Tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want UI component tests, so rendering is verified.

userStories.title: Testing - Integration Tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want integration tests, so flows work end-to-end.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: full pack opening flow (generate → animate → reveal → results)
Test: add card to collection flow
Test: battle flow (deck selection → battle → result)

userStories.title: Accessibility - Keyboard Navigation
userStories.description: As a keyboard user, I want full keyboard navigation, so I can use the app without a mouse.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: navigate entire app with keyboard only

userStories.title: Accessibility - Screen Reader Support
userStories.description: As a screen reader user, I want descriptive ARIA labels, so I can understand the interface.
acceptanceCriteria: Regions marked with landmark roles (main, nav, etc.)

userStories.title: Accessibility - Color Contrast
userStories.description: As a visually impaired user, I want sufficient color contrast, so text is readable.
acceptanceCriteria: All text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 for normal, 3:1 for large)
Stat bars have contrast against background

userStories.title: Accessibility - Reduced Motion
userStories.description: As a motion-sensitive user, I want reduced motion option, so animations don't cause discomfort.
acceptanceCriteria: When enabled: disable particle effects, screen shake

userStories.title: Mobile Responsive - Touch Targets
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want large touch targets, so the app is easy to use.

userStories.title: Mobile Responsive - Grid Layouts
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want responsive grids, so content fits my screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Test on iPhone SE (small), iPhone 12 (mid), iPad (tablet)

userStories.title: Mobile Responsive - Navigation
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want mobile-friendly navigation, so I can access all features.
acceptanceCriteria: Bottom navigation bar for key features

userStories.title: SEO - Meta Tags for All Pages
userStories.description: As a developer, I want proper meta tags, so Google indexes the site.
acceptanceCriteria: Open Graph tags for social sharing

userStories.title: SEO - Sitemap Generation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a sitemap.xml, so search engines discover pages.

userStories.title: SEO - Lighthouse Scores
userStories.description: As a developer, I want 90+ Lighthouse scores, so SEO is optimized.

userStories.title: Documentation - JSDoc for Core Logic
userStories.description: As a developer, I want JSDoc on core functions, so code is self-documenting.
acceptanceCriteria: Add JSDoc to all functions in src/lib/pack/generator.ts
Add JSDoc to all functions in src/lib/mechanics/combat.ts
Add JSDoc to all functions in src/lib/crafting/executor.ts
Run: bun run build (verify no JSDoc warnings)

userStories.title: Documentation - README Update
userStories.description: As a developer, I want README updated, so new contributors can onboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Add setup instructions (bun install, bun run dev)

userStories.title: Documentation - CLAUDE.md Update
userStories.description: As a developer, I want CLAUDE.md updated, so AI has accurate context.
acceptanceCriteria: Add new sections: battle mechanics, type advantages

userStories.title: Code Quality - TypeScript Strict Mode
userStories.description: As a developer, I want strict TypeScript, so type errors are caught early.
acceptanceCriteria: Run: bun run build (verify no type errors)

userStories.title: Code Quality - Linting and Formatting
userStories.description: As a developer, I want consistent code style, so code is readable.
acceptanceCriteria: Configure Prettier to match project style

userStories.title: Code Quality - Code Coverage
userStories.description: As a developer, I want 80%+ test coverage, so bugs are caught early.

userStories.title: Code Quality - Dead Code Elimination
userStories.description: As a developer, I want dead code removed, so bundle size is minimized.
acceptanceCriteria: Use ESLint to find unused variables/functions
Run: bun run build (verify no dead code warnings)

userStories.title: Analytics - Event Tracking
userStories.description: As a developer, I want event tracking, so I can understand user behavior.

userStories.title: Settings - Audio Settings
userStories.description: As a player, I want audio controls, so I can customize sound.
acceptanceCriteria: Accessible via gear icon in nav

userStories.title: Settings - Animation Quality
userStories.description: As a player, I want animation quality controls, so I can optimize performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Update ui.ts store with quality setting

userStories.title: Settings - Theme Toggle
userStories.description: As a player, I want theme toggle (light/dark), so I can use the app comfortably.
acceptanceCriteria: Dark mode: dark backgrounds, light text
Light mode: light backgrounds, dark text

userStories.title: Settings - Clear Data
userStories.description: As a player, I want clear data option, so I can start fresh.

userStories.title: Error Handling - Graceful Degradation
userStories.description: As a player, I want helpful error messages, so I know what went wrong.
acceptanceCriteria: Never crashes - always shows UI state

userStories.title: Error Handling - Network Error Recovery
userStories.description: As a player, I want network errors handled gracefully, so the app works offline.
acceptanceCriteria: Queue failed requests, retry when online
Service worker caching for core assets

userStories.title: Loading States - Skeleton Screens
userStories.description: As a player, I want skeleton screens, so the app feels responsive.

userStories.title: Tutorial - First-Time User Experience
userStories.description: As a new player, I want a quick tutorial, so I understand how to play.

userStories.title: Notifications - Toast System
userStories.description: As a player, I want toast notifications, so I get feedback on actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Toast appears on: pack opened, card crafted, battle won, etc.
Success: green, error: red, info: blue

userStories.title: Achievements - Unlock Notifications
userStories.description: As a player, I want achievement popups, so I feel rewarded.

userStories.title: Daily Rewards - Streak Tracking
userStories.description: As a player, I want daily login rewards, so I keep coming back.
acceptanceCriteria: Streak bonus: better rewards on consecutive days

userStories.title: Social Sharing - Share Modal
userStories.description: As a player, I want share modal, so I can choose how to share.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal opens on 'Share This Pull' click

userStories.title: Social Sharing - Image Generation
userStories.description: As a player, I want shareable images, so I can post on social media.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate pack collage: grid of 6 cards

userStories.title: Leaderboard - Global Rankings
userStories.description: As a player, I want leaderboards, so I can compare my progress.

userStories.title: Trading - Trade Offer System
userStories.description: As a player, I want to create trade offers, so I can trade with friends.

userStories.title: Crafting - Recipe System
userStories.description: As a player, I want to craft cards, so I can use duplicates.

userStories.title: Upgrades - Card Upgrade System
userStories.description: As a player, I want to upgrade cards, so I can improve favorites.
acceptanceCriteria: Visual indicator: star badge for upgraded

userStories.title: Batch Opening - Open Multiple Packs
userStories.description: As a player, I want to open multiple packs, so I can save time.

userStories.title: Card Comparison - Side by Side
userStories.description: As a player, I want to compare cards, so I can see which is better.

userStories.description: As a player, I want lightbox for cards, so I can view artwork.

Click to expand → see all cards

userStories.description: As a player, I want cinematic mode, so pack opening feels epic.
acceptanceCriteria: Best for first-time or special packs

userStories.description: As a developer, I want production build optimized, so deployment is ready.

userStories.description: As a developer, I want environment variables configured, so secrets are managed.

userStories.description: As a developer, I want pack validation, so exploits are prevented.

userStories.description: As a developer, I want input sanitized, so XSS is prevented.
acceptanceCriteria: Sanitize all user input (search, deck names, etc.)
Test: try XSS payloads, verify sanitized

userStories.description: As a developer, I want <3s initial load, so users don't bounce.

userStories.title: Performance - Animation Performance

userStories.title: Performance - Runtime Performance
userStories.description: As a developer, I want fast runtime performance, so interactions feel instant.
